title: Update Company Operations Manual
description: Following a change in regulations, an airline must update its company operations manual and notify all pilots.

tasks.description: Identify the sections of the operations manual affected by the new regulation.
Revise the manual to incorporate the new procedures.
Publish the revision and send a mandatory bulletin to all flight crew, requiring them to read and acknowledge the change.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent distributes the update and tracks acknowledgements.
